page.title: 11A DAY IN THE LIFE OF A MUM
page.content:
{JILL KNIGHT - ANSTEY LEICS.} I wake up at 7 am and get up at 7.30 to begin another day. After getting breakfast for the children, washing up and packing lunches for everyone, I get myself ready for work for 9.00am.
I work for a company which distributes books and I deal with orders for USA. Lunch break arrives and I shop for dinner on my way home, before returning in the afternoon.
At 4 pm I return home and start preparations for evening dinner. This is the most enjoyable time of the day to me,as we can all discuss the days events. After dinner is finished,there are a few more chores to do before relaxing for an hour or two with my husband,usually reading or watching TV and finally to bed about 11 pm.
